Name: Palygorskite (Mg,Al)_2Si_4O_10(OH).4H_2O
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicate
Subclass: Phyllosilicate
Particle Size: Fine
Sample No.: PS-4A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VSWIR
Origin: USA, Florida, Gadsden County
Collection Date: N/A
Description: Particle size was 0-45um.Collected by Clay Mineral Society Original ASTER Spectral Library name was jpl.beckman.mineral.silicate.phyllosilicate.fine.ps04a.spectrum.txt
Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units: Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:Reflectance (percent)

Last X Value:  2.5000
Number of X Values: 826
Additional Information: mineral.silicate.phyllosilicate.fine.vswir.ps-4a.jpl.beckman.ancillary.txt
